name: Primal Trial
description:
Description:

A raptor born in an unfamiliar environment needs to find its mother. On its journey, it needs to find food and water in order to survive. But its ultimate goal is to find tracks leading to its lost mother. 

In Primal Trial, you as the player are a godly being that decides the fate of a young raptor. You can influence the needs and properties of the raptor for its adventure. Can you find the optimal outcome?

Post your final score here!

Credits:

Julia Daxenbichler: AI Programming, UI Programming, Sprite Design

Kevin Hinker: AI Programming, UI Programming
